EnglishTitle: The Introduction to the Pauline Epistle

Hymn.Arabic: بولس عبد ربنا يسوع المسيح الرسول المدعو المفرز لبشرى الله.
Hymn.English: Paul the Servant of our Lord Jesus Christ, called to be an apostle appointed to the Gospel of God.

Hymn.Arabic: فصل من بشارة معلمنا بولس الرسول "" الى " " بركتة تكون معنا امين
Hymn.English: A reading from  " the first/ the second / the " Epistle of our teacher Paul to " ..... " . May his holy blessings be with us Amen.
